column1: Does this have club edition DLC????

qutote(Pre-ordering the game at ""participating retailers"" will also net access to the Borderlands 2 Premiere Club, to download the Gearbox Gun Pack, Golden Key, Vault Hunter's Relic and the Mechromancer character class when the game's out.)"
